attributes.action: Formally restart shielding during the second wave of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To prevent deaths of people who are extremely clinically vulnerable. Who maybe forced into a position to chose to work without clear shielding guidance for employers or financial aid. To prevent extremely clinically vulnerable becoming hospitalised through Covid 19 and producing a greater burden on the NHS
attributes.background: Restart with clear directions, formal shielding of the extremely clinically vulnerable. With financial support, aid in continuing to meet their ongoing medical needs and additional emotional and mental health support throughout further shielding.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reintroduce shielding with financial support
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552096
